Wd hd tv live can't play this video "Unable to play the selected file. Please see the User Manual for a list of supported file formats."

@jnhkll .mp4 is a supported file format WD HDTV Live. Maybe your player needs a reboot.
Unplug your player for 10 seconds and plug it in again. This may solve your problem. It has for me in the past.

@rudy988 i think the better question is, how don't you view this file. And I can't think of any way.

You can view it with mediaplayer which is standard for windows, but VLC probably the best for a guy like you.

if you cant play the file download VLC media player & windows media player classic.

if you still cant play the file on either of those media players and you have windows then download shark007 codec for win 7 or win 8.

if you still cant play the file... the computer gods hate you^^

if you want to play the file on your ps3 then download Tversity media share program.

Tversity will play any kind of video file you put on it, literally :D
Whats with the weird format? It wont work on PS3 with the media server... sigh gotta convert it.
Nevermind, for some reason there is not file extension it just says file. Added the .mpg to the end and it works fine :D.
